name: Lendo Inc.
description: Provider of peer-to-peer lending services intended to help small and medium enterprises pre-finance their invoices. The company offers an alternative to regular short-term finance by borrowing money against outstanding invoices and individual lending through individuals as well as provides investment tracking services through application, enabling businesses and individuals to meet their short-term and working capital needs.
one_liner: Provider of peer-to-peer lending services intended to help small and medium enterprises pre-finance their invoices. The company offers an alternative to regular short-term finance by borrowing money against outstanding invoices and individual lending through individuals as well as provides investment tracking services through application, enabling businesses and individuals to meet their short-term and working capital needs.
